content: I think I'll start with the Shopify plan ($79/month) for now. I don't have a large team, and I think the features it offers will be sufficient for my business. I do want to offer gift cards and need abandoned cart recovery, so this plan seems like the best fit. Thanks for your help in deciding! By the way, I've been thinking about starting my own business for a while, and I'm excited to finally take the leap.
